bibl.title: Bulletin de liaison du Groupe international d'étude de la céramique égyptienne. XV
bibl.note: "In the Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum vol. III, I dated many lamps (Q2100-2122 and Q2163-2177) of types now found at Mons Claudianus to the third and fourth centuries A.D. These lamps were in production at the beginning of the second century A.D."
BAILEY Donald, Aspects of the Dating of Certain Egyptian Lamps.
Bulletin de liaison du Groupe international d'étude de la céramique égyptienne. XV (Le Caire, 1991) pp. 41-42.
